lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.Copier

Packages that use Copier
lu.uni.geko.ext.ifc The base package for an extension that customises GeKo, a generic model weaver, for IFC building models.

Uses of Copier in lu.uni.geko.ext.ifc
 

Classes in lu.uni.geko.ext.ifc that implement Copier
 class IfcCopier
          An implementation of the interface Copier that is used by the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.copierfactoryext handling the generation of identifiers and setting of the owner history for IFC building models.

Uses of Copier in lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy
 

Classes in lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy that implement Copier
 class DefaultCopier
          The default implementation of the interface Copier that is responsible for creating base elements corresponding to existing advice elements for the CopierFactoryExt extension point.

It currently implements the global and per join point advice instantiation scope.

To copy the elements it uses a AbstractDeferringManuallyReferencingRecursivePkgVariantCopier which is a modified version of EcoreUtil.Copier.
 

Fields in lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy with type parameters of type Copier
private static Map<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,Copier> DefaultCopierFactory.ROOT2COPIERMAP
          The mapping from root elements of woven models to copiers.
 

Methods in lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy that return Copier
 Copier DefaultCopierFactory.getCopier(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject rootEObject, Advice advice)
           
 Copier CopierFactoryExt.getCopier(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject wovenRoot, Advice advice)
          Returns the copier that is responsible for creating new base elements corresponding to existing advice elements for the given root element of a woven model and the given advice.
